properties.description: Quick access to the gutter structure nodes references
properties.name: _refs

properties.description: Whether or not splitter can be dragged         Values: false, true         Default: false
properties.name: allowDrag

properties.description: Whether or not the gutter sections can be collapsed         Values: false, true         Default: false
properties.name: collapsible

properties.description: Maximum size the first section can be increased to         Default: 0
properties.name: max

properties.description: Minimum size the first section can be decreased to         Default: 0
properties.name: min

properties.description: The value in pixels under which the gutter should behave as a no desktop device         Default: 500
properties.name: responsiveLimit

properties.description: Gutter direction type         Values: horizontal, vertical         Default: horizontal
properties.name: type

methods.description: Check device resolution and change the splitter size
methods.name: _applyResponsive

methods.description: Change splitter style size
methods.name: _changeSplitterSize

methods.description: Check drag limits before it starts
methods.name: _checkMoveConstraints

methods.description: Splitter clickable zone click listener
methods.name: _clickCollapsible

methods.description: Collapse section to a specific gutter edge
methods.name: _collapse

methods.description: Set up splitter drag functionality
methods.name: _drag

methods.description: Restore section to its previous size state
methods.name: _expand

methods.description: Reverse collapsible element icon
methods.name: _rotateCollapseIcon

methods.description: Set the new section size after gutter resizing
methods.name: _sectionResize

methods.description: Set gutter collapsible functionality
methods.name: _setCollapsible

methods.description: Apply gutter styling and user customizable behavior
methods.name: _setUpGutter

methods.description: Set sections size and styling

methods.description: Create splitter and configure it
methods.name: _setUpSeparator

methods.description: Set up the browser specific splitter style fixes
methods.name: _splitterStyleBrowserFix

methods.description: Set splitter position on touch screen device browsers
methods.name: _splitterStyleOnTouchScreen

methods.description: Collapse/ expand gutter section
methods.name: _toggleCollapse

methods.description: Add or remove collapsible element icon animation
methods.name: _toggleCollapseAnimation

methods.name: collapse
